thread.title: Gang nabbed for heists, attacks in Pretoria, Johannesburg
thread.title_full: Gang nabbed for heists, attacks in Pretoria, Johannesburg | News24

author: news24.com
title: Gang nabbed for heists, attacks in Pretoria, Johannesburg
text:
Cape Town - Four Zimbabwean men linked to a number of house and business robberies as well as murders and attempted murders in Pretoria North and Johannesburg South will appear in the local magistrateâ€™s court on Monday.
A tip off led to three of the men, believed to be part of a bigger gang, being nabbed, confirmed police spokesperson Lieutenant Colonel Lungelo Dlamini.
"More arrests of their accomplices may follow soon," he said in a statement.
"Three suspects were arrested in Pretoria North after police received information about an imminent business robbery in the area. The suspects were spotted travelling in a Toyota Rav 4.
